channel.title: Huge server error please someone help [562]
channel.description: Ok well ive ran my server for 562 coded alot and today when the server was running alot of people were on and this error randomly appeared out of no were?! [code]Exception in thread "WorkerThread" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.rs2hd.model.FamiliarInventory.OrganizeNotes(FamiliarInventory.ja a:260) at com.rs2hd.model.FamiliarInventory.LoadNotesFirstTime(FamiliarInvento y.java:61) at com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender.Notes(ActionSender.java:538) at com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender.sendLogin(ActionSender.java:501) at com.rs2hd.WorkerThread.run(WorkerThread.java:104) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] after this error appeared no one could login? so i restart the server saying wtf then after i run it each time anyone trys to login it says that problem. so i replace the whole rs2hd and even little things inside it same error? if anyone can help me or needs anything to help please reply this is a huge problem idk what the cause was so please help thanks!

item.title: Huge server error please someone help [562]
item.dc:creator: @battlescape562 battlescape562
item.description:
@battlescape562 wrote:

Ok well ive ran my server for 562 coded alot and today when the server was running alot of people were on and this error randomly appeared out of no were?! Exception in thread "WorkerThread" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.rs2hd.model.FamiliarInventory.OrganizeNotes(FamiliarInventory.ja a:260) at com.rs2hd.model.FamiliarInventory.LoadNotesFirstTime(FamiliarInvento y.java:61) at com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender.Notes(ActionSender.java:538) at com.rs2hd.net.ActionSender.sendLogin(ActionSender.java:501) at com.rs2hd.WorkerThread.run(WorkerThread.java:104) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
after this error appeared no one could login? so i restart the server saying wtf then after i run it each time anyone trys to login it says that problem. so i replace the whole rs2hd and even little things inside it same error? if anyone can help me or needs anything to help please reply this is a huge problem idk what the cause was so please help thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Huge server error please someone help [562]
